main.name: Dairon Ferrer
main.description: A student with a passion for technology and design. I am currently enrolled in the UNC Chapel-Hill's coding bootcamp, with ambitions to succeed in the development world.
main.bio: A Junior Full Stack Developer with a background in sales, medical interpreting and forklift operation. I have enjoyed a variety of work experience, but I am now prepared to make my development passion into my life-long career.
main.contactmessage: Here is my information if you wish to contact me.

resume.skillmessage: As a current student, apart from classwork, I keep practicing these skills and polishing my abilities to be highly proficient in these and many more languages/frameworks.

education.description: Learned and practiced full stack web development.
Enrolled in high school and college at the same time to earn college credits towards an Associates Degree of Arts.

work.title: Distribution Laborer
work.description: Certified lift operator working in the shipping department at the Advance, North Carolina fullfilment center.

work.title: Freelance Medical Interpreter
work.description: Spanish interpreter working in various medical clinics and hospitals accross Winston Salem.

testimonials.text: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of success.
